Predictive: What will happen, and why?

•

Prescriptive: How to make it happen, and why?

C1:

The full text must be assessable.

C2:

The record must be a peer-reviewed journal paper, conference paper, or book chapter.

C3:

The outlet cannot employ a permissive review process as part of its business model.

C4:

The outlet must demonstrate a minimum level of research impact.

C5:

The paper must develop an end-to-end DPSA application according to Definition 3.

C6:

The paper cannot have the development of generic methods or tools as its main focus.
